descriptionHtml:
Requires:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

There is only one size of the armor.  The slider won\'t have an effect.  If this doesn\'t suit your tastes, you\'ll have to use the original.

Changes in v1.2:
~lower, wider shoulders
~cbbe V2 bottom
~Boots redone (higher, thinner heels, thicker calve section and larger ankle guard)
~Bust redone to look more natural, while still looking slightly \'uplifted\'
~wider upper body section
~added the option to have hip guards or not. 


I\'m planning on doing a slight retex of this armor also.  It needs to look more banged up and battle-worn in my opinion.



I may add more armor sets at a later date.  In the meantime, many thanks for your endorsements!

Installation:
You know the drill;  pick a version and drop it into the Data folder.


Credits:
~Kurese for the original for TES4
~Invalidfate for porting it to TES5
~XunAmarox and 2pac4eva7 for their tutorials on using Blender to manipulate Skyrim meshes.  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3790

I would like to ask that if you with to use this for any other mod, just let me know about it.
author: Carrolj2
